Template.HtmlPart:
Congratulations {{name}},

Smart move on your new subscription! The peace of mind you'll have once you understand the numbers, the operations, and how to cost a menu accurately is priceless. From here, things can only get better!

Sign In

Model and Build

Now you've subscribed, you have access to your own venue and can start modelling your cafe and building out your menu. As you model and build, you can check how the numbers stack up on the dashboard at any time.

Coaching Notes

We're here to support you as you navigate the path to building a thriving cafe business. With handy coaching notes, pop-ups, and guides at every stage, you'll gain the knowledge and confidence you need to succeed.

Fine-Tuning and Hospitality Mentorship

We partner with Clever Cafe Company, leaders in cafe-specific business coaching, to provide subsidised mentorship ensuring you receive additional support when you need it. Register today and book yourself in for a HospoSure Mentorship session.

We're stoked you're here and want to make your startup or established cafe the best it can be. If you have any questions or need assistance along the way, reach out to us anytime at hello@hosposure.com.au. Take good care and enjoy the journey!
